segments.text: I notice the water first, overflowing from the sink and creating a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's making such a mess, and the woman is just standing there, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the children behind her, the boy on a stool trying to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so wobbly, and the girl is just waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the kids are being really sneaky, taking advantage of the woman's distraction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely absorbed in drying that plate, like nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the garden outside, so calm and tidy, and it's such a contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the cookie jar is almost empty, and the boy is really stretching to get the last few.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, like it's the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope everything turns out okay and no one gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
